Banking & Finance.title: Bank holidays next week: When are banks closed from 24-30 November? — Check here
Banking & Finance.summary: Bank holiday next week: According to the RBI calendar, banks across India will be shut on just one day this week — Sunday, 30 November. On all other days, banking operations will remain open as usual.

Banking & Finance.title: Mint Quick Edit | The rupee’s sharp Friday drop: Where is the exchange rate headed?
Banking & Finance.summary: The rupee slid past 89 to the dollar last week. This can be traced to a confluence of factors, including a hands-off RBI. A trade deal with the US may turn its path around, but without one, the case for a weaker currency strengthens.
